page.title: 02MY VILLAGE; BOTANY BAY.
page.content: Botany Bay is a nice place. It has lots of houses, when I say lots, it only has 27, but that is a lot for such a small area. I live next to a corn field. Me and my friends play in it when it is long, but it is only long for a short time because the farmer cuts it down. Past the corn fields there is a strawberry field. I sometimes go and pick some strawberries for the farmer. There are also raspberries and gooseberries to pick later in the year. The people who live in my village are mainly nice, but there are lots of children who live near to us and they make a lot of noise, often waking me early in the morning.
